refnamediv.refpurpose: Read a vector (several scalars simultaneously) from a table.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This opcode reads vectors from tables at k-rate.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: vtable1k is a reduced version of vtablek, it only allows to access the first vector (it is equivalent to vtablek with kndx = zero, but a bit faster). It is useful to easily and quickly convert a set of values stored in a table into a set of k-rate variables to be used in normal opocodes, instead of using individual table opcodes for each value.

note.para: vtable1k is an unusual opcode as it produces its output on the right side arguments of the opcode.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
Here is an example of the vtable1k opcode. It uses the files vtable1k.csd.
Example of the vtable1k opcode.
